question: Will "Big Boys" win the 2025 GLAAD Media Award for Outstanding Film -- Limited Release?
reasoning:
Based on the information gathered:

1. **Nomination**: "Big Boys" is nominated for the Outstanding Film – Limited Release category at the 36th GLAAD Media Awards. This nomination indicates that the film meets the criteria set by GLAAD, which includes fair, accurate, and inclusive representations of the LGBTQ community, as well as boldness, originality, cultural impact, and overall quality.

2. **Competition**: The film is competing against other nominees such as "20,000 Species of Bees," "Backspot," "Before I Change My Mind," "Close to You," "Crossing," "Fitting In," "High Tide," "Housekeeping for Beginners," and "A Place of Our Own." The presence of strong competitors can influence the probability of winning.

3. **Film Characteristics**: "Big Boys" is a comedy-drama with LGBTQ+ themes, directed and written by Corey Sherman. It was released as a limited release, making it eligible for this category. The film's originality and quality, as well as its representation of LGBTQ+ themes, are likely factors in its nomination.

4. **Cultural Impact and Quality**: The film's distribution by Dark Star Pictures, known for independent films, suggests a potential for cultural impact within niche audiences. The film's reception and reviews, which were not fully detailed here, would further inform its chances.

Given these factors, the probability of "Big Boys" winning the award depends on how it is perceived in terms of its representation, originality, cultural impact, and overall quality compared to its competitors. Without specific reviews or insights into how it stands out among the nominees, estimating the probability involves some uncertainty.

FINAL PROBABILITY: 0.2

---
title: GLAAD Media Awards Nominations Revealed; ‘Emilia Pérez’ Snubbed
author: Erik Pedersen
url: https://deadline.com/2025/01/glaad-media-awards-nominations-2025-list-1236260334/
hostname: deadline.com
description: We have nominees for the 36th GLAAD Media Awards, which honor fair, accurate and inclusive representations of the LGBTQ+ community. 'Emilia Pérez' gets snubbed.
sitename: Deadline
date: 2025-01-22
categories: ['News']

We have the nominees for the 36th annual [GLAAD](https://deadline.com/tag/glaad/) Media Awards, which honor fair, accurate and inclusive representations of the lesbian, gay, bisexual, transgender and queer community in film, TV, music, videogames, podcasts, journalism and more.

But the noms don’t include one of the most talked-about films of 2024 or its trans star. More on that below.

Vying for the Outstanding Wide-Release Film prize are *Cuckoo, Drive-Away Dolls, Love Lies Bleeding, Mean Girls, My Old Ass, Problemista, Queer *and *Wicked*. Up for the Limited-Release Film award are *20,000 Species of Bees, Backspot, Before I Change My Mind, Big Boys, Close to You, Crossing, Fitting In, High Tide, Housekeeping for Beginners *and *A Place of Our Own*.

Noticeably absent from the GLAAD noms is Jacques Audiard’s Oscar contender * Emilia Pérez*, which

[won the Golden Globe](https://deadline.com/2025/01/golden-globes-2025-winners-list-1236246217/)this month, and its trans star Karla Sofía Gascón, who also won a Globe and is up

[for SAG](https://deadline.com/2025/01/sag-awards-nominations-2025-1236249911/)and

[BAFTA awards](https://deadline.com/2025/01/bafta-nominations-conclave-emilia-perez-wicked-hugh-grant-1236257429/)in February. Back in November, GLAAD put out an article titled

[“‘Emilia Pérez’ is Not Good Trans Representation,”](https://glaad.org/emilia-perez-is-not-good-trans-representation/)labeling the film — among other things — a “profoundly retrograde portrayal of a trans woman” and calling it “a step backward.”

### Watch on Deadline

Despite the snub for its *Emilia Pérez*, Netflix still dominated the GLAAD noms with 27 to lead all networks and platforms. ABC was the only other to muster double digits, with 10. Prime Video got nine, and Hulu and CBS took eight apiece.

Here are the nominees for the 2025 [GLAAD Media Awards](https://deadline.com/tag/glaad-media-awards/):

# 36th Annual GLAAD Media Awards Nominees

The GLAAD Media Awards recognize and honor media for their fair, accurate and inclusive representations of the lesbian, gay, bisexual, transgender and queer (LGBTQ) community and the issues that affect their lives.

Below is the full list of nominees for the 36th Annual GLAAD Media Awards. A tip sheet with a breakdown of nominations by media and trends among the nominees is available at [this link](https://glaad.org/releases/tip-sheet-diversity-facts-and-figures-for-the-36th-glaad-media-awards-nominees/). If you would like to attend the 36th Annual GLAAD Media Awards, [click here](https://glaad.org/mediaawards/36/tickets/) to learn more.

**NOMINEES FOR THE 36TH ANNUAL GLAAD MEDIA AWARDS**

**Outstanding Film – Wide Theatrical Release**

*Cuckoo*(Neon)*Drive-Away Dolls*(Focus Features)*Love Lies Bleeding*(A24)*Mean Girls*(Paramount Pictures)*My Old Ass*(Amazon MGM Studios)*Problemista*(A24)*Queer*(A24)*Wicked*(Universal Pictures)

**Outstanding Comedy Series**

*Abbott Elementary*(ABC)*Ghosts*(CBS)*Hacks*(Max)*Loot*(Apple TV+)*The Sex Lives of College Girls*(Max)*Shrinking*(Apple TV+)*Somebody Somewhere*(HBO)*Sort Of*(Max)*We Are Lady Parts*(Peacock)*What We Do in the Shadows*(FX)

**Outstanding Drama Series**

*9-1-1: Lone Star*(Fox)*Arcane*(Netflix)*The Chi*(Showtime)*Doctor Who*(Disney+)*Found*(NBC)*Heartbreak High*(Netflix)*Anne Rice’s Interview with the Vampire*(AMC)*Star Trek: Discovery*(Paramount+)*The Umbrella Academy*(Netflix)*Wicked City*(ALLBLK)

**Outstanding New Series**

*Agatha All Along*(Disney+)*Black Doves*(Netflix)*Brilliant Minds*(NBC)*Diarra from Detroit*(BET+)*Fantasmas*(HBO)*Hazbin Hotel*(Amazon Prime Video)*How to Die Alone*(Hulu)*Kaos*(Netflix)*No Good Deed*(Netflix)*Palm Royale*(Apple TV+)

**Outstanding Film – Streaming Or TV**

*Am I Ok?*(Max)*Fancy Dance*(Apple TV+)*Good Grief*(Netflix)*The Groomsmen: Second Chances*(Hallmark)*The Holiday Exchange*(Amazon Prime Video / Peacock)*Mother of the Bride*(Netflix)*Ricky Stanicky*(Amazon Prime Video)*Season’s Greetings from Cherry Lane*(Hallmark)*Sweethearts*(Max)*Wynonna Earp: Vengeance*(Tubi)

**Outstanding Documentary**

---
title: GLAAD Media Awards Nominations Revealed; ‘Emilia Pérez’ Snubbed
author: Erik Pedersen
url: https://deadline.com/2025/01/glaad-media-awards-nominations-2025-list-1236260334/
hostname: deadline.com
description: We have nominees for the 36th GLAAD Media Awards, which honor fair, accurate and inclusive representations of the LGBTQ+ community. 'Emilia Pérez' gets snubbed.
sitename: Deadline
date: 2025-01-22
categories: ['News']
---
We have the nominees for the 36th annual [GLAAD](https://deadline.com/tag/glaad/) Media Awards, which honor fair, accurate and inclusive representations of the lesbian, gay, bisexual, transgender and queer community in film, TV, music, videogames, podcasts, journalism and more.

But the noms don’t include one of the most talked-about films of 2024 or its trans star. More on that below.

Vying for the Outstanding Wide-Release Film prize are *Cuckoo, Drive-Away Dolls, Love Lies Bleeding, Mean Girls, My Old Ass, Problemista, Queer *and *Wicked*. Up for the Limited-Release Film award are *20,000 Species of Bees, Backspot, Before I Change My Mind, Big Boys, Close to You, Crossing, Fitting In, High Tide, Housekeeping for Beginners *and *A Place of Our Own*.

Noticeably absent from the GLAAD noms is Jacques Audiard’s Oscar contender * Emilia Pérez*, which

[won the Golden Globe](https://deadline.com/2025/01/golden-globes-2025-winners-list-1236246217/)this month, and its trans star Karla Sofía Gascón, who also won a Globe and is up

[for SAG](https://deadline.com/2025/01/sag-awards-nominations-2025-1236249911/)and

[BAFTA awards](https://deadline.com/2025/01/bafta-nominations-conclave-emilia-perez-wicked-hugh-grant-1236257429/)in February. Back in November, GLAAD put out an article titled

[“‘Emilia Pérez’ is Not Good Trans Representation,”](https://glaad.org/emilia-perez-is-not-good-trans-representation/)labeling the film — among other things — a “profoundly retrograde portrayal of a trans woman” and calling it “a step backward.”

### Watch on Deadline

Despite the snub for its *Emilia Pérez*, Netflix still dominated the GLAAD noms with 27 to lead all networks and platforms. ABC was the only other to muster double digits, with 10. Prime Video got nine, and Hulu and CBS took eight apiece.

Here are the nominees for the 2025 [GLAAD Media Awards](https://deadline.com/tag/glaad-media-awards/):

**Outstanding Film – Wide Theatrical Release**Cuckoo (Neon)

Drive-Away Dolls (Focus Features)

Love Lies Bleeding (A24)

Mean Girls (Paramou…

Below is the full list of nominees for the 36th Annual GLAAD Media Awards. If you would like to attend the 36th Annual GLAAD Media Awards, [click here](https://glaad.org/mediaawards/36/tickets/) to learn more.

messages.content:
Based on the following question, analyze it carefully and provide your probability estimate.

Question: Will "Big Boys" win the 2025 GLAAD Media Award for Outstanding Film -- Limited Release?
Background: According to [Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/GLAAD_Media_Award), "Honorees are selected by a process involving over 700 GLAAD Media Award voters and volunteers and are evaluated using four criteria: "Fair, Accurate and Inclusive Representations" of the LGBT community, "Boldness and Originality" of the project, significant "Cultural Impact" on mainstream culture, and "Overall Quality" of the project. Results are then certified by a "Review Panel" who determine the final list of recipients based on voting results and their own "expert opinions"."

{"url": "https://deadline.com/2025/01/glaad-media-awards-nominations-2025-list-1236260334/", "snippet": "---
title: GLAAD Media Awards Nominations Revealed; ‘Emilia Pérez’ Snubbed
author: Erik Pedersen
url: https://deadline.com/2025/01/glaad-media-awards-nominations-2025-list-1236260334/
hostname: deadline.com
description: We have nominees for the 36th GLAAD Media Awards, which honor fair, accurate and inclusive representations of the LGBTQ+ community. 'Emilia Pérez' gets snubbed.
sitename: Deadline
date: 2025-01-22
categories: ['News']
---
We have the nominees for the 36th annual [GLAAD](https://deadline.com/tag/glaad/) Media Awards, which honor fair, accurate and inclusive representations of the lesbian, gay, bisexual, transgender and queer community in film, TV, music, videogames, podcasts, journalism and more.

But the noms don’t include one of the most talked-about films of 2024 or its trans star. More on that below.

Vying for the Outstanding Wide-Release Film prize are *Cuckoo, Drive-Away Dolls, Love Lies Bleeding, Mean Girls, My Old Ass, Problemista, Queer *and *Wicked*. Up for the Limited-Release Film award are *20,000 Species of Bees, Backspot, Before I Change My Mind, Big Boys, Close to You, Crossing, Fitting In, High Tide, Housekeeping for Beginners *and *A Place of Our Own*.

Noticeably absent from the GLAAD noms is Jacques Audiard’s Oscar contender * Emilia Pérez*, which

[won the Golden Globe](https://deadline.com/2025/01/golden-globes-2025-winners-list-1236246217/)this month, and its trans star Karla Sofía Gascón, who also won a Globe and is up

[for SAG](https://deadline.com/2025/01/sag-awards-nominations-2025-1236249911/)and

[BAFTA awards](https://deadline.com/2025/01/bafta-nominations-conclave-emilia-perez-wicked-hugh-grant-1236257429/)in February. Back in November, GLAAD put out an article titled

[“‘Emilia Pérez’ is Not Good Trans Representation,”](https://glaad.org/emilia-perez-is-not-good-trans-representation/)labeling the film — among other things — a “profoundly retrograde portrayal of a trans woman” and calling it “a step backward.”

### Watch on Deadline

Despite the snub for its *Emilia Pérez*, Netflix still dominated the GLAAD noms with 27 to lead all networks and platforms. ABC was the only other to muster double digits, with 10. Prime Video got nine, and Hulu and CBS took eight apiece.

Here are the nominees for the 2025 [GLAAD Media Awards](https://deadline.com/tag/glaad-media-awards/):

**Outstanding Film – Wide Theatrical Release**Cuckoo (Neon)

Drive-Away Dolls (Focus Features)

Love Lies Bleeding (A24)

Mean Girls (Paramou…

# 36th Annual GLAAD Media Awards Nominees

The GLAAD Media Awards recognize and honor media for their fair, accurate and inclusive representations of the lesbian, gay, bisexual, transgender and queer (LGBTQ) community and the issues that affect their lives.

Below is the full list of nominees for the 36th Annual GLAAD Media Awards. A tip sheet with a breakdown of nominations by media and trends among the nominees is available at [this link](https://glaad.org/releases/tip-sheet-diversity-facts-and-figures-for-the-36th-glaad-media-awards-nominees/). If you would like to attend the 36th Annual GLAAD Media Awards, [click here](https://glaad.org/mediaawards/36/tickets/) to learn more.

**NOMINEES FOR THE 36TH ANNUAL GLAAD MEDIA AWARDS**

**Outstanding Film – Wide Theatrical Release**

*Cuckoo*(Neon)*Drive-Away Dolls*(Focus Features)*Love Lies Bleeding*(A24)*Mean Girls*(Paramount Pictures)*My Old Ass*(Amazon MGM Studios)*Problemista*(A24)*Queer*(A24)*Wicked*(Universal Pictures)

**Outstanding Comedy Series**

*Abbott Elementary*(ABC)*Ghosts*(CBS)*Hacks*(Max)*Loot*(Apple TV+)*The Sex Lives of College Girls*(Max)*Shrinking*(Apple TV+)*Somebody Somewhere*(HBO)*Sort Of*(Max)*We Are Lady Parts*(Peacock)*What We Do in the Shadows*(FX)

**Outstanding Drama Series**

*9-1-1: Lone Star*(Fox)*Arcane*(Netflix)*The Chi*(Showtime)*Doctor Who*(Disney+)*Found*(NBC)*Heartbreak High*(Netflix)*Anne Rice’s Interview with the Vampire*(AMC)*Star Trek: Discovery*(Paramount+)*The Umbrella Academy*(Netflix)*Wicked City*(ALLBLK)

**Outstanding New Series**

*Agatha All Along*(Disney+)*Black Doves*(Netflix)*Brilliant Minds*(NBC)*Diarra from Detroit*(BET+)*Fantasmas*(HBO)*Hazbin Hotel*(Amazon Prime Video)*How to Die Alone*(Hulu)*Kaos*(Netflix)*No Good Deed*(Netflix)*Palm Royale*(Apple TV+)

**Outstanding Film – Streaming Or TV**

*Am I Ok?*(Max)*Fancy Dance*(Apple TV+)*Good Grief*(Netflix)*The Groomsmen: Second Chances*(Hallmark)*The Holiday Exchange*(Amazon Prime Video / Peacock)*Mother of the Bride*(Netflix)*Ricky Stanicky*(Amazon Prime Video)*Season’s Greetings from Cherry Lane*(Hallmark)*Sweethearts*(Max)*Wynonna Earp: Vengeance*(Tubi)

**Outstanding Documentary**

- “Breaking the News”
